title: Analyze Parking Violation Hotspots
description: A parking enforcement manager wants to know which areas have the most parking violations to better allocate enforcement officers.

tasks.description: Retrieve all parking violation data from the last 3 months.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully queries the parking enforcement database.

tasks.description: Generate a heatmap visualization showing the density of violations across the city.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system generates a map highlighting the streets with the most tickets.

tasks.description: Create a report with the top 5 violation hotspots for the enforcement manager.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides an actionable intelligence report.
